question: Bad behaviour to parents and bad dua! Help!!!i lose my temper.... Is there a prayer that can be said that will make me a better child?
answer:

Ask them to forgive%0D%0Ayou for every hurt and pain caused to them. Ask them to make positive dua%0D%0Afor you, for your character and for your future especially to change the dua%0D%0Afrom Hell to Paradise. Only dua can change taqdeer. Rememeber Our Creator%0D%0AAllah Ta'ala is Most Merciful continuous in Mercy, a Mercy that we cannot%0D%0Aunderstand, neither possess but we need to make effort to gain the Mercy and%0D%0AAllah Ta'ala has given us hope in the Quraan - "Do not despair in the Mercy%0D%0Aof Allah Ta'ala."%0D%0A%0D%0ASo your father's and mother's deep hearted duas for you will help.%0D%0AFurthermore it will need a deep hearted effort and need from within you to%0D%0Achange. Remember place Allah Ta'ala in front of you. If you take one step%0D%0Atowards Allah, HE will take ten towards you, making your path easy for you%0D%0A(something to the effect). Your parents too will get a shock.%0D%0A3. Greet them and show them kindness morning and evening. Do them little%0D%0Aextra favours. (Remember it's your duty and they don't have to appreciate%0D%0Ait. So don't expect anything in return. Do this for Allah Ta'ala's pleasure%0D%0Aonly).%0D%0A4.
